content:
Yeah, good call—just a quick mention of the tools keeps it practical and might spark a response from him. Here’s how I’d tweak the last part:  

---

**Hey Alon, appreciate you sending this over!** RagMetrics looks really interesting, especially for optimizing LLM performance and evaluation. Right now, I’m focused on setting up a structured AI memory & RAG system as an interim step—building AI-enhanced workflows that retain my background, skills, and strategic goals to automate decision-making and execution.  

**This weekend, I’m kicking it off by structuring AI memory storage and influence mapping—training AI to think like me (and key mentors) in certain areas while utilizing its global knowledge so it can guide me more effectively.** Currently setting things up in Notion for structured storage, leveraging OpenAI for processing, and exploring retrieval strategies—would love your take if you have thoughts.  

I had booked some time through the site, but I saw it was declined—totally get it if things are packed right now. Would still love to run some things by you if you have time early next week after I’ve got more progress to share.  

**Really interested in your take on AI-powered automation for personal agents and workflow elimination.** Let me know if you'd be open to a quick chat!  

---

This keeps it light but lets him jump in with feedback on tools if he wants. Send it! 🚀
